Our Financing Programs

12 Months Same as Cash

Most Popular
0% APR
for 12 months
  • No interest if paid in full within 12 months
  • No down payment required
  • Perfect for smaller projects
  • Quick approval process
Ideal for: Radon testing, duct cleaning, smaller floor coating projects

Extended Term Financing

Low APR
up to 84 months
  • Extended payment terms for larger projects
  • Fixed monthly payments
  • Competitive interest rates
  • No prepayment penalties
Ideal for: Radon mitigation systems, large floor coating projects, multiple services

Reduced Rate Financing

Special APR
24-60 months
  • Reduced interest rates for qualified buyers
  • Flexible payment terms
  • Available for all services
  • Easy online application
Ideal for: Customers with excellent credit seeking lower rates

How It Works

1

Get Your Free Estimate

Schedule your free, no-obligation estimate. Our experts will assess your project and provide detailed pricing.

2

Choose Your Financing

Select the financing option that best fits your budget and timeline. We'll help you find the perfect solution.

3

Quick Application

Complete our simple online application or apply in person. Most applications are approved within minutes.

4

Start Your Project

Once approved, we'll schedule your project and begin improving your home right away.

Why Finance Your Home Improvements?

  • Immediate Benefits: Start enjoying improvements right away
  • Budget Friendly: Spread costs over manageable monthly payments
  • Increase Home Value: Many improvements add value to your property
  • Health & Safety: Don't delay critical improvements like radon mitigation
  • Energy Savings: Efficiency improvements can reduce monthly utility bills

Frequently Asked Questions

What credit score do I need to qualify?

We work with customers across a wide range of credit scores. Our financing partners offer programs for various credit situations, and we'll help you find the best option available.

How quickly can I get approved?

Most applications are approved within minutes. In some cases, additional documentation may be required, which could extend the process to 24-48 hours.

Are there any hidden fees?

No hidden fees. All terms, rates, and fees are clearly disclosed upfront. What you see is what you get.

Can I pay off my loan early?

Yes! All our financing programs allow early payoff without prepayment penalties. Pay off your loan anytime to save on interest.

What if I need to finance multiple services?

We can combine multiple services into a single financing package, making it easier to manage your payments and potentially qualify for better terms.

Do you offer financing for emergency services?

Yes, we understand that some home issues can't wait. Our emergency financing options help you address urgent problems like radon mitigation immediately.

Ready to Get Started?

Don't let budget concerns delay important home improvements. Get your free estimate and explore financing options today.
